summary: Adds the Grave of Adam Adamowicz and a Concept Art Book near the Dark Brotherhood Entrance.
descriptionHtml:
Hi, Folks!

This is my very first mod with the Creation Kit and im new in the modder scene.
I decided to do this as my first mod because I\'m very sad that Adam Adamowicz passed away from us.
I added a grave and a Concept Art Book near the Dark Brotherhood Entrance.

Next time i will probably do a bigger mod like a player home or somehing.
Creation Kit is so amazing!!!
author: bronzeP
